Description: eSM module: Overload outputschannel AParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:5V overvoltageParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: eSM internal power supply errordetected

Description: eSM module: System error detected:5V undervoltageParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: eSM internal power supply errordetected

Description: eSM module: ESMSTART: Maximumpermissible pulse duration exceededParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Correctives: Pulse duration must be less than 4seconds.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:RAMParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Stack overflowParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Program sequence control(communication)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Program sequence control (Idle task)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Firmware checksumParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Parameter outside ofpermissible value rangeParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: Parameter outside of permissiblevalue range.

Description: eSM module: Parameter checksumerror detectedParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Correctives: Reconfigure the eSM. Contact yourSchneider Electric servicerepresentative.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:SPI framing error detectedParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Input states channel Aand channel B are not identicalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Wire break or connected devices areinoperable.

Description: eSM module: Output states channelA and channel B are not identicalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Short circuit to 24V DC. System errordetected.
Correctives: Verify wiring and connected devices.Verify connection of STO_A andSTO_B. Contact your SchneiderElectric service representative.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:Position evaluation error detected(values not identical)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: CPU_A and CPU_B have differentposition values. This condition mayhave been caused by the encoder.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:Velocity evaluation error detected(values not identical)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: CPU_A and CPU_B have differentvelocity values. This condition mayhave been caused by the encoder.
